adjectives.description: lacertian (comparative more lacertian, superlative most lacertian)

entries.meaning: Pertaining to or resembling a lizard; lizard-like. [from 19th c.]
examples: None of these lacertian giants survived the Pleistocene era. For the Javan and Timorese varanids, only a handful of bones remind us of their existence, and the timing of their extinctions remains unknown.
